body:
Comment 3 by **emmanuel.feller**: 
it's a solution but I find it very verbose and error prone, since the complex templates
will have several level of 
repeated section. 

I agree on skipping nil value, but what do you mind about the following syntax :

{.repeated section list}
the value is not nil
{.onNil}
the value is nil
{.or}
if the list itself is nil
{.end}

it's more compact.

Btw, could you add more doc and samples on the template package ? it is not simple to
understand.

thks for answer
